name: ROOTa
description:
The new sensational one tap game is finally released!
Can you handle incoming "Energy" properly? Give it a try!
Good judgement and instantaneous ability are needed to clear a stage.
Every time you clear a stage, something happens on fruits of the tree.
Clear stages and grow your original tree!
Get a high score on the Infinity Stage, and share your recored to all over the world!

[How to play]
・Open the trigger to let the energy through if it has the same color.
・Close the trigger to block the energy which has a different color.
・Get the target number of energies reach to the final destination, and clear the stage.
